title: Give Your Summer Outfits a Boost With These Must-Have Bag Trends
description: Take stock before the season’s in full swing.
excerpt: Take stock before the season’s in full swing.
text: Now that the season for spring cleaning is behind us, it’s time to start filling up our closets again! We jest....kinda. There’s no doubt that your social calendar is loaded for summer, and you’ll need accessories to go with all those darling wedding guest dresses and linen sets. So, naturally, we’re presenting the best bag trends for summer. Keep scrolling to see which themes will dominate the season and where to buy our tried-and-true picks. Canvas and Leather Peanut butter and jelly. Summer and spritzes. Zendaya and Tom. Some pairings are just meant to be. Canvas has always made for a classic beach bag option, but this summer, it’s especially on-trend when paired with leather accents, trim, or paneling. One part practical and one part luxury. Bottega Veneta Small Parachute Leather & Canvas Shoulder Bag Polène Ilo Bag DeMellier Hudson Leather-Canvas Top Handle Bag Miu Miu Beau Canvas and Leather Top Handle Bag Madewell The Leather Knot BagVanity Bags Is that a dopp kit or a purse? Actually, it’s called a nécessaire—and it’s what all the classiest ladies will be carrying around this summer. Although the wraparound zipper inhibits easy grab-and-go access, this style will definitely keep your items secure. Saint Laurent Gaby Mini Vanity Bag Prada Flou Leather Vanity CaseTory Burch T Monogram Denim Vanity CaseAlaïa Cube Leather Vanity Leather Cube Gucci Mini Vanity Bag with Bamboo HandleHardware For spring, it was all about jewelry on shoes. Now for summer, this trend is taking over bags. Whether it’s studs, grommets, or other metallic embellishments, this one is the personality pièce du jour. Dolce & Gabbana Sicily HandbagProenza Schouler Silo Eyelet Leather Shoulder Bag Tory Burch Pierced HandbagClare V. Lune Bag Khaite Lotus Grommet Calfskin Tote BagNetting and Mesh You might already have a fisherman’s or market tote in your closet somewhere, but if not, you’re going to want to purchase one ASAP. Actual netted bags are a hazard for small items like loose change, pens, and bobby pins because they can easily slip through the yarn, but these options, which feature fine-knit mesh or lined netting, are much better choices. Prada Leather-Trimmed Mesh ToteUrban Revivo Shell Décor Mesh BagsMango Flower-Embroidered Mesh Bag Velvet by Graham & Spencer Mesh Bucket Bag Now 30% OffBimba y Lola Mesh BagSlouchy SilhouettesIf your purse can slouch, so can you! Posture? I hardly know her. Okay, enough of the jokes. In all seriousness: Structure is out, and laid-back hobo styles are in. Reformation Vittoria Tote Citizens of Humanity Boho Bag Givenchy Nano Voyou Bag Bottega Veneta Hop Intrecciato Hobo Bag Liffner Pillow Pouch Suede This one might throw you for a loop because this material is usually designated for fall and winter, but 2025 is shaping up to be the summer of suede. Maybe it’s because of the boho-grunge renaissance, but who’s to say? Whatever the reason, we’ll happily oblige. html:
Now that the season for spring cleaning is behind us, it’s time to start filling up our closets again! We jest....kinda. There’s no doubt that your social calendar is loaded for summer, and you’ll need accessories to go with all those darling wedding guest dresses and linen sets. So, naturally, we’re presenting the best bag trends for summer. Keep scrolling to see which themes will dominate the season and where to buy our tried-and-true picks.

    Canvas and Leather

    Peanut butter and jelly. Summer and spritzes. Zendaya and Tom. Some pairings are just meant to be. Canvas has always made for a classic beach bag option, but this summer, it’s especially on-trend when paired with leather accents, trim, or paneling. One part practical and one part luxury.

    Bottega Veneta Small Parachute Leather & Canvas Shoulder Bag

    Polène Ilo Bag

    DeMellier Hudson Leather-Canvas Top Handle Bag

    Miu Miu Beau Canvas and Leather Top Handle Bag

    Madewell The Leather Knot Bag

      Vanity Bags

      Is that a dopp kit or a purse? Actually, it’s called a nécessaire—and it’s what all the classiest ladies will be carrying around this summer. Although the wraparound zipper inhibits easy grab-and-go access, this style will definitely keep your items secure.

      Saint Laurent Gaby Mini Vanity Bag

      Prada Flou Leather Vanity Case

      Tory Burch T Monogram Denim Vanity Case

      Alaïa Cube Leather Vanity Leather Cube

      Gucci Mini Vanity Bag with Bamboo Handle

        Hardware

        For spring, it was all about jewelry on shoes. Now for summer, this trend is taking over bags. Whether it’s studs, grommets, or other metallic embellishments, this one is the personality pièce du jour.

        Dolce & Gabbana Sicily Handbag

        Proenza Schouler Silo Eyelet Leather Shoulder Bag

        Tory Burch Pierced Handbag

        Clare V. Lune Bag

        Khaite Lotus Grommet Calfskin Tote Bag

          Netting and Mesh

          You might already have a fisherman’s or market tote in your closet somewhere, but if not, you’re going to want to purchase one ASAP. Actual netted bags are a hazard for small items like loose change, pens, and bobby pins because they can easily slip through the yarn, but these options, which feature fine-knit mesh or lined netting, are much better choices.

          Prada Leather-Trimmed Mesh Tote

          Urban Revivo Shell Décor Mesh Bags

          Mango Flower-Embroidered Mesh Bag

          Velvet by Graham & Spencer Mesh Bucket Bag

          Now 30% Off

          Bimba y Lola Mesh Bag

          Slouchy Silhouettes

          If your purse can slouch, so can you! Posture? I hardly know her. Okay, enough of the jokes. In all seriousness: Structure is out, and laid-back hobo styles are in.

          Reformation Vittoria Tote

          Citizens of Humanity Boho Bag

          Givenchy Nano Voyou Bag

          Bottega Veneta Hop Intrecciato Hobo Bag

          Liffner Pillow Pouch

          Suede

          This one might throw you for a loop because this material is usually designated for fall and winter, but 2025 is shaping up to be the summer of suede. Maybe it’s because of the boho-grunge renaissance, but who’s to say? Whatever the reason, we’ll happily oblige.

          Coach Brooklyn Shoulder Bag

          Marge Sherwood Large Shoulder Bag

          Now 20% Off

          Staud Mini Taru Shoulder Bag

          Madewell Essentials Bucket Tote

          Loeffler Randall Laith Wide Woven Top Handle Bag

            Why Trust ELLE

            Every product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. We only recommend products that we stand behind, and the merchandise featured on our site is always driven by editorial and product testing standards, not by affiliate deals or advertising relationships. Any content created in partnership with advertisers is marked as such.
